content.text: Determine the SI base units of power
SI base units of power   .........
Show that \(C\) has no units

The efficiency of the turbine is \(55\%\) and the electric power output \(P\) is \(3.50 \times 10^5 \text{W}\)
Calculate the wind speed
wind speed =   .........  \(\text{ms}^{-1}\)
Suggest two reasons why the electrical power output of the turbine is less than the power available from the wind
Fig. 1.1 shows a turbine that is used to generate electrical power from the wind

State the principle of moments

Hence determine the mass \(M\) of the object O
A uniform rod AB is attached to a vertical wall at A. The rod is held horizontally by a string attached at B and to point C, as shown in Fig. 3.1

The angle between the rod and the string at B is \(50^{\circ}\). The rod has length \(1.2 \text{m}\) and weight \(8.5 \text{N}\). An object O of mass \(M\) is hung from the rod at B. The tension \(T\) in the string is \(30 \text{N}\)
Use the concept of equilibrium to explain why a force must act on the rod at A
